attributes.action: Use HALL effect to generate electricity from traffic moving on motorway network.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use HALL effect to generate electricity from traffic moving on motorway network. By burying coils in the the motorway then fitting magnets to undersides of vehicles, then the HALL effect can be used to generate electricity from moving traffic. The electricity can then be processed for storage and usage.
